directions: Boil potatoes with 1/2 tsp salt till they are done. Drain and keep aside.
Heat about 4 tbsp of oil and add mustard, cumin, fennel, cinnamon, star anise and curry leaves.
Gently fry the spices. When the mustards have stopped popping, add onions, chillies, ginger and turmeric.
Cook till the onions are slightly golden brown. Add tomatoes, salt ( if necessary) and cook till they form a thick paste.
Reduce heat and add the cooked potatoes. Coat potatoes with the turmeric spice mix and remove from heat.
Garnish with your choice herbs. Serve hot.
Note: To make Spicy Tumeric Potato Masala, just add one tablespoon of chilli powder to the ingredients.
ingredients: 4 medium Russet potatoes, cut each into 8 pieces
2 green/red or dried chillies, cut each into 4
title: Potato Turmeric Masala
